comments.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
comments.confirmDescription: Deleting this comment is a permanent action. Are you sure you want to delete it?

errorBoundary.description: You can check the technical issue here:
errorBoundary.subtitle: Something went wrong. Sorry for the inconvenience.
errorBoundary.title: Oops there was an error üò≠

invalidUser.firstMessage: I'm sorry {name} but your email "{email}" is not from Rootstrap.
invalidUser.secondMessage: Please logout and login again with an "@rootstrap.com" email

onboarding.alreadyPlayer: If you where already a player and you are experiencing some weird behavior, we recommend you logout and login again. If this doesn't work please bring the issue to the
onboarding.encouragingMessage: The most important thing, have fun! And let the competition begin üí™üèº
onboarding.intro: This is Rootstrap's implementation of the world famous game
onboarding.newPlayer: If it is your first time here, please
onboarding.title: Welcome to RS WORDLE!

rules.maxAttemptsMessage: Guess a word in {maxAttempts} attempts or less
rules.lettersAmountMessage: The word could have between {minLetters} and {maxLetters} letters
rules.dailyWordMessage: Every day you will have a different word to guess and it will be the same for everyone
rules.validWordMessage: Each guess must be a valid English word
rules.keyboardMessage: To write the word you can use either your keyboard or the virtual keyboard provided
rules.submitMessage: To submit the word use the Enter key (of either keyboard)
rules.colorExplanation: The color of the letters will change to show you if the letter is or not in the word and in the correct position.
rules.correctExplanation: is in the word and in the correct position
rules.misplacedExplanation: is in the word but in the wrong position
rules.incorrectExplanation: is not in the word in any position
rules.repeatedLettersMessage: Take into account that the word could have repeated letters, meaning you could have the same letter in different positions both painted in their corresponding color

suggestions.confirmDescription: Deleting "{title}" is a permanent action. Are you sure you want to delete it?
suggestions.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this suggestion?
suggestions.slogan: Have a suggestion or want to report a bug? You are in the correct place!
suggestions.title: Title
